FuncDef: This command specifies the port to be synchronized with the multi-chassis peer and a synchronization tag to be used while synchronizing this port with the multi-chassis peer.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the port to be synchronized with the multi-chassis peer.
Specifies the LAG ID to be synchronized with the multi-chassis peer.
Specifies a synchronization tag to be used while synchronizing this port with the multi-chassis peer, up to 32 characters in length.
